attributes.action: prevent the needless slaughter of the bull SHAMBO at the Skanda Vale Temple
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The bullock has tested positive to an inital test for Bovine TB. Normally, in commercial farming, this would result in the death of the animal, however, in this case, the monks have undertaken to isolate the animal and to treat it if it does really develop bovine TB. Slaughter is a totally inappropriate response in this (and many other) cases. Vaccinate instead.
